sections.heading: New Mexico poison and drug information center created.Section 23-10-2 - Certification.Section 23-10-3 - Duties.
sections.text:
The "New Mexico poison and drug information center" is created as part of the university of New Mexico health sciences center.

History:Laws 2013, ch. 56, § 1.

Effective dates.— Laws 2013, ch. 56 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 14, 2013, 90 days after the adjournment of the legislature.

sections.heading: Certification.
sections.text:
The New Mexico poison and drug information center shall maintain certification by the American association of poison control centers.

History:Laws 2013, ch. 56, § 2.

Effective dates.— Laws 2013, ch. 56 contained no effective date provision, but, pursuant to N.M. Const., art. IV, § 23, was effective June 14, 2013, 90 days after the adjournment of the legislature.
